column4: so I'm trying to get guild wars to work with wine.. using this as reference: http://www.linuxlogin.com/games/guildwars.php          but how do I set up the registry keys at the bottom of the page? I can't find the direct3d registry with wine regedit
what Wine version, what Guild Wars version?
I think it's HKEY_CURRENT_USER\Software\Wine\Direct3D, create if they dont exist
0.9.44 wine and guild wars.. well.. uhm
gonna try again now then and see if it just breaks like last time :P
at the moment, check the Wine AppDb here: http://appdb.winehq.org/appview.php?iAppId=2243
but yeah I've installed drivers for ATI.. used to Envy-script, real nice stuff
not too sure about your issue, may be better served in #winehq
thanks though :) I'll check it out and see if anyone can help me tomorrow, it's past mid night here so I need to hit the sack ^^
